motions.title: Motion to Adjourn
motions.description: Motion to adjourn the special called meeting after the public hearing on 2025 millage rate.

publicHearings.title: Public Hearing for Establishing 2025 Millage Rate
publicHearings.description: Third and final public hearing for proposed 2025 millage rate of 3.040 mills, same as previous year. No speakers for or against, one citizen with general property tax questions.
publicHearings.recommendation: Staff recommend adoption of resolution setting 2025 millage rate at 3.040 mills
